lead_paragraph: The National Hockey League (NHL) was non-committal about players' future participation in the Olympics on Tuesday, leaving open the possibility that the Sochi Games might be the last to showcase the world's best players.

headline.main: NHL Holds Fire on Whether to Release Players for 2018 Games
headline.print_headline: NHL Holds Fire on Whether to Release Players for 2018 Games

snippet: The National Hockey League (NHL) was non-committal about players' future participation in the Olympics on Tuesday, leaving open the possibility that the Sochi Games might be the last to showcase the world's best players....
